roleset.name: transition smoothly to the next subject
roleset.note: SEGUE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: segue-v (common typo)
example.text: Another time I 'll segueway into all the fun work related instances where " Mommies " get out of doing work and hiding behind childcare as the reason .
example.arg: into all the fun work related instances where " Mommies " get out of doing work and hiding behind childcare as the reason

example.name: segue-n
example.text: His segue from activist comic to Citizen Gregory was a natural progression.
